> The hologram apperared as scorpinok entered. The door shut behind him. "Now
>listen this is important. Megs troops may be on there way here.You will help
>me win thier trust so that they can learn what they need to know to survive.
>I must try and reunite the predacons. I have a message for megs to see from
>an old friend of his. When he gets here you must hide. Do as I say." he
>pointed to a smalkl chamber where he was to stay. Do not touch the green
>butto. Megs must believe he is the first one here."

"Megatrons coming?" Scorponok says a little bewilderd, "Scorponok, Loyal to
Megatron, I will wait and greet him."
